column3: Upgrade from Basic to Standard Plan
column5: User must have an active Basic plan
column6:
1. Navigate to Account settings
2. Click on "Change Plan"
3. Select "Standard" Plan
4. Confirm upgrade and make payment

column3: Upgrade from Standard to Premium Plan
column5: User must have an active Standard plan
column6:
1. Navigate to Account settings
2. Click on "Change Plan"
3. Select "Premium" Plan
4. Confirm upgrade and make payment

column3: Downgrade from Premium to Standard Plan
column5: User must have an active Premium plan
column6:
1. Navigate to Account settings
2. Click on "Change Plan"
3. Select "Standard" Plan
4. Confirm downgrade

column3: Downgrade from Standard to Basic Plan
column5: User must have an active Standard plan
column6:
1. Navigate to Account settings
2. Click on "Change Plan"
3. Select "Basic" Plan
4. Confirm downgrade

column5: User has an active plan with auto-renewal enabled
column6:
1. Wait for the billing cycle to end
2. Ensure auto-renewal is ON
3. Check for automatic payment processing

column5: User has an expired or expiring subscription
column6:
1. Navigate to Account settings
2. Click on "Renew Subscription"
3. Select payment method and confirm

column5: User has an expired card as payment method
column6:
1. Wait for auto-renewal attempt
2. System tries to charge expired card
column7: Payment fails and prompts user to update card details

column6:
1. Navigate to Account settings
2. Click on "Cancel Subscription"
3. Confirm cancellation
column7: Subscription set to cancel at the end of billing cycle

column6:
1. Navigate to Account settings
2. Click on "Retry Payment"
3. Enter new payment method
4. Confirm payment

column5: User has a subscription expiring within 7 days
column6:
1. Wait for system notification email/SMS
2. Check user notifications in the account
